note: Made guitar in photo from garbage dump scrsps while silent Trappist monk. Bob Dylan's fault: heard him sing 'How many times must a man turn his head, and pretend he just doesn't see?' via smuggled tape. Been banging on ever since, primarily re climate justice and creativity. 1. for the beautiful woods even we monks were throwing away. And 2. because I live in Nicaragua, one of the countries most unjustly scalded by the climate crisis Nicaraguans have done virtually nothing to create.
